parameters.query:
SELECT
    a.ad_channel as channel,
    a.client_id,
    c.telegram_id,
    c.vk_id,
    c.whatsapp_id,
    c.avito_id,
    c.phone
  FROM appeals a
  JOIN clients c ON c.id = a.client_id
  WHERE a.id = '{{ $json.appeal_id }}'::uuid

INSERT INTO messages_history (
  tenant_id,
  appeal_id,
  message_type,
  message_text,
  channel,
  channel_id,
  external_message_id,
  external_chat_id
)
SELECT
  NULLIF('{{ $('Prepare Telegram Payload').item.json.tenant_id }}','')::uuid,
  '{{ $('Prepare Telegram Payload').item.json.appeal_id }}'::uuid,
  'operator',
  '{{ $json.result.text }}',
  '{{ $('Prepare Telegram Payload').item.json.channel }}',
  (SELECT id FROM channels WHERE code = '{{ $('Prepare Telegram Payload').item.json.channel }}' LIMIT 1),
  '{{ $json.result.message_id }}',
  NULLIF('{{ $('Prepare Telegram Payload').item.json.chat_id }}','')
RETURNING *;
